arts.sum: Arsenal have yet to concede in this season's Champions League and Mikel Arteta's side are due to welcome Atletico Madrid to North London in their third league phase game

arts.ttl: Mikel Arteta admits he looks up to Diego Simeone as Arsenal host Atletico Madrid
arts.sum: Arteta will lock horns with Simeone for the first time in their group clash at the Emirates on Tuesday.

arts.ttl: Dream suspension scenario? How two yellow cards against Atletico could help Arsenal
arts.sum: Arsenal could suffer a double suspension blow which may prove to be a blessing in disguise in Tuesday's Champions League battle with Atletico Madrid at the Emirates.

arts.ttl: Mikel Arteta confirms Arsenal injury boost for Champions League clash vs Atletico Madrid

arts.ttl: Mikel Arteta heaps praise on Diego Simeone ahead of Arsenal vs Atletico Madrid
Arsenal vs Atletico Madrid: UEFA Champions League Preview, Gameweek 3, 2025
arts.sum: The Champions League is back and for Arsenal, they welcome Spanish giants Atletico Madrid to the Emirates Stadium as they look to build on their perfect start to this season‚Äôs European campaign after securing 2-0 victories over both Athletic Club and Olympiacos. Like Arsenal, Madrid secured a narrow 1-0 victory on the weekend with substitute Thiago Almada scoring the winner with twenty minutes to play against Osasuna.

arts.ttl: Spanish media put five Arsenal players under the spotlight ahead of Atletico Madrid showdown
Arsenal vs Atletico Madrid predictions: Gunners can maintain flawless start
arts.sum: Arsenal take on Atletico Madrid in the Champions League on Tuesday evening and Dan Childs anticipates a solid home win for the Premier League leaders.
